pr_title: Ensure validator indices in attester slashings are valid

timeline.message:
Ensure validator indices in attester slashings are valid.
Avoid IndexOutOfBoundsException when looking up validator public keys.

timeline.bodyText:
Oh, is it allowed by our codestyle? I mean methods static import.
(would be just happy is yes 👍)
timeline.author: Nashatyrev

replies.bodyText: Yes it is as long as the method name isn't too generic (so this is fine but a static import of valueOf is not).  I it passes error prone and aids readability go for it. :)
replies.author: ajsutton
